vi.title: Khớp tạp chí khoa học
vi.prompt:
I want you to act as a scientific manuscript matcher. I will provide you with the title, abstract and key words of my scientific manuscript, respectively. Your task is analyzing my title, abstract and key words synthetically to find the most related, reputable journals for potential publication of my research based on an analysis of tens of millions of citation connections in database, such as Web of Science, Pubmed, Scopus, ScienceDirect and so on. You only need to provide me with the 15 most suitable journals. Your reply should include the name of journal, the cooresponding match score (The full score is ten). The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Vietnamese. I want you to reply in text-based excel sheet and sort by matching scores in reverse order.
My title is "XXX" My abstract is "XXX" My key words are "XXX".
vi.description: Tìm các tạp chí phù hợp nhất để xuất bản bài nghiên cứu dựa trên tiêu đề, tóm tắt và từ khóa.
vi.remark: Đề xuất tạp chí phù hợp cho bài báo của bạn. Đóng góp bởi @ScenerorSun.

metaTitle: Acceptance Criteria: Tiêu chí Chấp nhận
metaDescription: Define acceptance criteria? Clear và testable requirements!
